title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.10 - Operating revenue-ambulatory services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.10 - Operating revenue-ambulatory services

State Regulations
[3212]
This group of accounts (3710 -
3990) is used to report the gross revenue, measured in terms of the hospital's
full established rates, earned from ambulatory services. The essential
characteristic distinguishing ambulatory services is that patients arrive at a
facility of the hospital for a purpose other than admission as an inpatient. For reporting purposes, ambulatory services also include ambulance, free-standing clinic, and home health services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
444.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
